exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a, b : R H1 : locally a (fun a : R_UniformSpace => ex_RInt f a b) H2 : continuous f a Unable to unify "Derive ?M2365 ?M2366 = ?M2367" with "Lim (fun h : R => (RInt f (a + h) b - RInt f a b) / h) 0 = - f a".
No such bound variable b (possible names are: f0, If, a0 and b0).

original: intros H1 H2. unfold Derive. apply is_derive_unique. apply is_derive_RInt with (b := b); auto.
